offsetS.description: How much a single repetition of the texture is offset from the beginning, in the S direction. Typical range is 0.0 to 1.0.

offsetT.description: How much a single repetition of the texture is offset from the beginning, in the T direction. Typical range is 0.0 to 1.0.

tileS.description: How many times the texture is repeated across the surface, in the S direction.

tileT.description: How many times the texture is repeated across the surface, in the T direction.
